maqras.text: Mein iss sher ki qasam khata hun
aur ap is sher mein muqeem hein
aur (qasam hy)insani bap aur olad ki
Yaqeenan hum ney insan ko(bari)mushaqat mein paida kia hy
kiya yeh guman kerta hy kay yeh kisis kay bas mein hi nai
khyta (phirta )hy ky mein ney to bohat kuch maal khrch ker dala
kiya(yun) samjhta hy ky kisi nay ussy dekha(hi ) nahi
kiya hum nay uski do ankhein nahi banain
aur zaban aur hunt(nahi banaey)
hum nay dekha diy usko dono rasty
So issy na hosakha kay ghatti mein dakhil hota
Aur kiya samjha ky ghatti hy kiya
Kisi garden(gulam londi)ko azad kerna
ya bhok waly din khana khilana
Kisi reshtydar yateem ko
Ya khahsaar miskeen ko
Phir unlogon mein say hojata jo iman laey aur ik dosry ko sabar ki aurreham kerney ki wasiyat kerty hein
Yehi log hein daein bazo waly(khushbakhti waly)
Aur jin logon nay humari aayaton kay sath kufur kiya yeh kam-bakhti waly hain
Inn hi per aag hogi jo charo taraf say gheri hoi hogi
Qasam hai sooraj ki aur uski dhoop ki
Qasam hai chand ki jab uskay peechay ay
Qasam hai din ki jab soraj ko numaya keray
Qasam hai raat ki jab ussay dhanp lay
Qasam hai aasman ki aur uskay bananey ki
Qasam hai zamen ki or ussy hamwar kernay ki
Qasam hai nafs ki or ussy durust bananey ki
phir samjh di usko badkari ki aur bach ker chalnay ki
Jiss nay ussay pak kiya wo kamyab hua
Aur jiss nay ussay khak mein mila diya wo nakam hoa
(Qom)samood nay apni sarkashi kay baees jhutlaya
Jab unka bara badbakht uth khara hoa
Unhein Allah kay rassol nay farmadiya tha kay Allah Taalaa ki ontni aur uss kay peeenay ki bari ki (hifazat karo)

Un logon nay apnay pyghamber ko jhota samjh ker uss ontni ki kochein kaat dein pus unkay rab nay unkay gunahon kay baees un per halakat dali aur phir halakat ko aam kerdiya aur uss basti ko barabar ker diya
Wo nahi darta uskay tabahkun anjam say
Qasam hai raat ki jab cha jaey
Aur qasam hai din ki jab roshan ho
Aur qasam hai uss zaat ki jiss nay nar-o-mada ko peda kiya
Yaqeenan tumhari koshish mukhtalif qisim ki hai
Jiss nay diya (Allah ki rah mein)aur dara (apnay rab say)
Aur nek baat ki tasdeq kerta rahega
To hum bhi usko aasan rasty ki saholat dein gay
Lekin jiss nay bakheel ki aur beparwai barti
Aur nek baat ki takzeeb ki
To hum bhi uski tangi-o-mushkil kay saman mayuser kerdein gay
Uska maal ussy(ondha)giraney kay waqat kuch kam na ay ga
Be-shak raah dikha dena himaray zimmay hai
Aur humary hi hath akhrat aurduniya hai
Mein nay to tumhein sholay marti hui aag say dara diya hai
Jiss mein sirf wo hi badbakht dakhil hoga
Jiss nay jhutlaya aur(uski perwi say)mun pher liya
Aur iss say assa shaks dor rakha jaey ga jo bara perhezgar hoga
Jo paaki hasil kernay kay liey apna maal deta hai
Kissi ka uss per koi ehsan nahi kay jiss ka badla diya jaraha ho
bulkay sirf apnay perwardigar buzruk-o-buland ki raza chahnay kay liey
Yaqeenan wo (Allah bhi) un qareeb raza mand hojaeyga
Qasam hai chasht kay waqt ki
Aur qasam hai raat ki jab cha jaey
Naa to tery rab nay tujhy chora hai aur na woh bezar hogaya hai
Yaqenan tery liey injam aghaz say behter hoga
Tujhy tere rab baht jald (inam )dyga aur to razi (o khush )hojaey ga
Kiya us nay tujhy yateem paker jagah nahi di
Aur tujhay raah bhola paker hidayat nahi di
Aur tujhy na-daar paaker to-nagar nahi banadiya
Pus yateem per to bhi sakhti na kiya ker
Aur na sawal kernay waly ko dant dapat
Aur apnay rab ki nematon ko biyan kerta reh
